item.title: Veteran Tour Chronicler Cameron Crowe Finally Set to Go on Tour Himself, With Guests Including Sheryl Crow and Kate Hudson
item.description: Filmmaker Cameron Crowe got his start interviewing touring musicians for Rolling Stone, and now he’s finally going on tour himself. Crowe will be taking on the role of headliner in seven cities
